pages.title: Medicinal Mushrooms
pages.text: <item>Medicinal Mushrooms/$ are a farmable crop which has uses in brewing. They require darkness or mycelium, and spread to adjacent blocks like normal mushrooms. They can not be grown into a giant mushroom.$(br2)There are four potion types which can be made with either
the <item>medicinal mushroom/$ or <item>medicinal mushroom powder/$. Nausea, Blindness, Sedation, and Neutralization.$(br2)

<thing>Sedation/$ potions disable the AI of any mob it is applied to. Sedated mobs will not move on their own, fight back, attack, or otherwise react to their environment. It can be used for transporting mobs or keeping them for display.$(br2)It does not work on players
or boss monsters, but will instead apply flat debuffs.$(br2)
<thing>Neutralization/$ potions are milk in potion form. They remove all potion effects.$(br2)
